```{r}
df_h <- read.csv("mtcars.csv", header = TRUE)
df_h
```


```{r}
res.dist <- dist(df_h, method = "euclidean")
res.dist
```

```{r}
as.matrix(res.dist)[1:6, 1:6]
```

## single
```{r}
res.hc_single <- hclust(d = res.dist, method = "single")
res.hc_single
```
## complete
```{r}
res.hc_complete <- hclust(d = res.dist, method = "complete")
res.hc_complete
```
## average
```{r}
res.hc_average <- hclust(d = res.dist, method = "average")
res.hc_average
```
## ward.D
```{r}
res.hc_ward <- hclust(d = res.dist, method = "ward.D")
res.hc_ward
```


## ward.D2
```{r}
res.hc_ward2 <- hclust(d = res.dist, method = "ward.D2")
res.hc_ward2
```


```{r}
fviz_dend(res.hc, k = 5, # Cut in four groups
          cex = 0.5, # label size
          k_colors = color_pallet,
          color_labels_by_k = TRUE, # color labels by groups
          rect = TRUE # Add rectangle around groups
)
```
